annotation_sentence: Um, hello! Yes, about Friday... I think we say 8 p.m., not 7 p.m.?
rationale: The sentence contains multiple speech acts: a greeting ('Um, hello!'), an agreement ('Yes'), an expression of uncertainty ('I think'), a statement ('we say'), and a correction ('not 7 p.m.').

annotation_sentence: Ah, maybe I mistake. I think I heard 8 p.m. from last time. Sorry.
rationale: The sentence includes an expression of realization ('Ah'), uncertainty ('maybe'), a statement of belief ('I think'), and an apology ('Sorry').

annotation_sentence: Hmm, 7 is okay. I just worry about train... I mean, if I can arrive on time.
rationale: The sentence contains a hesitation ('Hmm'), an expression of agreement ('is okay'), a statement of concern ('I just worry'), and a clarification ('I mean').

annotation_sentence: Yes, train is busy in evening. Sometimes delay... um, like late.
rationale: The sentence includes an agreement ('Yes'), a statement ('is busy'), an expression of frequency ('Sometimes delay'), a hesitation ('um'), and an approximation ('like late').

annotation_sentence: Thank you! I try my best. Also, um, about place. We meet at cafe, right?
rationale: The sentence contains an expression of gratitude ('Thank you'), a promise ('I try'), a hesitation ('um'), and a request for confirmation ('right').

annotation_sentence: Yes, it is good. I like their coffee. Very warm and relax.
rationale: The sentence includes an agreement ('Yes'), a statement ('is good'), an expression of preference ('I like'), and a description ('Very warm and relax').

annotation_sentence: Ah, I like... how to say... the one with milk and little sugar?
rationale: The sentence contains an expression of realization ('Ah'), a statement of preference ('I like'), and a request for assistance ('how to say').

annotation_sentence: Yes, latte! I always forget name. Very tasty.
rationale: The sentence includes an agreement ('Yes'), a statement ('latte'), an admission of forgetfulness ('I always forget'), and a description ('Very tasty').

annotation_sentence: Yes, very nice. I look forward to see you on Friday.
rationale: The sentence contains an agreement ('Yes'), a description ('very nice'), and an expression of anticipation ('I look forward').

annotation_sentence: Okay, I will tell you. Thank you for understanding!
rationale: The sentence includes an agreement ('Okay'), a promise ('I will tell'), and an expression of gratitude ('Thank you').
The sentence contains a farewell ('Bye-bye') and an expression of future meeting ('See you').
